steps.processorData:
select
    a/name/value as name,
    a/context/start_time/value as created,
    e/ehr_id/value as ehr_id,
    e/ehr_status/subject/external_ref/id/value as mrn,
    e/ehr_status/subject/external_ref/namespace as authority,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0018]/value/value as assessment_date,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0021]/items[at0025]/value/symbol/value as symptomatic_change,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0021]/items[at0060]/value/value as fluid_balance_reviewed,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0021]/items[at0061]/value/value as ICU_team_review_required,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0021]/items[at0052]/value/value as patient_relative_informed,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0021]/items[at0048]/value/value as further_COVID_testing_indicated,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0021]/items[at0062]/value/value as able_to_communicate_with_relatives,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0021]/items[at0063]/value/value as last_communication_between_HCP_and_family,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0023]/items[at0065]/value/value as patient_in_clinical_trial,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0023]/items[at0068]/value/value as patient_eligble_for_clinical_trial,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0019]/items[at0004]/value/value as VTE_assessment_completed,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0019]/items[at0005]/value/value as TEP_assessment_completed,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[at0009]/value/value as for_escalation_to_ITU_HDU,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[at0010]/value/value as for_resuscitation,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0023]/items[at0040]/value/value as covid_clinical_diagnosis,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0023]/items[at0043]/value as first_sympton_onset,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0023]/items[at0031]/value as contact_with_confirmed_or_probable_case,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0023]/items[at0035]/value as X_Ray_or_CT_changes_compatible_with_COVID
from EHR e contains
top 1
COMPOSITION a
contains EVALUATION a_a[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.covid19_ward_patient_checklist.v0]
where a/archetype_details/template_id/value='COVID19 Ward Patient Checklist'
order by created desc
